      • initialize

        protected void initialize()
        Description copied from class: InferenceApplication
        Get objects ready for inference. This will call into the abstract method completeInitialize().
        Overrides:
        initialize in class InferenceApplication

      • completeInitialize

        protected void completeInitialize()
        Description copied from class: InferenceApplication
        Complete the initialization process. Most of the infrastructure will have been constructued. The child is responsible for constructing the AtomManager and populating the ground rule store.
        Specified by:
        completeInitialize in class InferenceApplication

      • inference

        public void inference()
        Description copied from class: InferenceApplication
        Minimizes the total weighted incompatibility of the GroundAtoms in the Database according to the Model and commits the updated truth values back to the Database. The RandomVariableAtoms to be inferred are those persisted in the Database when this method is called. All RandomVariableAtoms which the Model might access must be persisted in the Database.
        Specified by:
        inference in class InferenceApplication

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: ModelApplication
        Releases all resources used by this ModelApplication.
        Specified by:
        close in interface ModelApplication
        Overrides:
        close in class InferenceApplication
